answer:
There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC.  You can find information on locating immunization records here. 
- Immunization Nurse

## There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC.


## You can find information on locating immunization records here.

question: How do I get my childs immunization record? He was born in BC and has had all his vaccines here?
